# Example settings file for CamSwitch
# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE
animation: animation.mp4
minimal motion time: 0.05
minimal idle time: 7.0
motion sensitivity: 15
motion size sensitivity: 500
location x: -10
location y: -10
width: 500
height: 500
frame delay: 1
test mode: 0
flip: 1
#
#any setting that is missing would default to the value set above.
#meaning, a settings only containing:
#"
#minimal motion time: 1
#"
#would have minimal motion time set to 1, location x set to -10 and the input
#animation file set to animation.mp4 and so on...
